title: Edge 98 is out with multi-profile improvements and more security
content:
Microsoft has updated its Edge browser to version 98, in line with the four-week schedule for new updates. This release comes with some improvements for PCs with multiple Edge profiles, plus a new security mode and other improvements. For users that have multiple Edge profiles set up, you can now create a list of sites

The post Edge 98 is out with multi-profile improvements and more security appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has released Edge 98 in the stable channel with automatic profile switching rules for specific sites and a new security mode.
